texts.text: Oh the sky! There are different
things in the sky, day and night.
A big cloud. A small cloud.
A big bird. A small bird.
A flying bird. A singing bird.
The big sun. A small star.
The big sun shines. A small star sparkles.
Oh the sky! There are different
things in the sky, day and night.
Where should I go?
Oh the forest! There are different
things in the forest!
A tall giraffe eating from a short tree.
Big monkeys
and small monkeys.
They play with
long and short sticks.
Oh, the forest! There are different
things in the forest.
Where should I go?
Oh the ocean! There are different
things in the ocean.
A big boat. A small boat.
A fast boat. A slow boat.
A happy dancing fish. A sad looking fish.
A big octopus with long legs.
A small octopus with short legs.
Oh the ocean! There are different
things in the ocean.
Where should I go?
My home! I love my home.
There are so many things at home.
A plate of food.
I am ready to eat.
Yum! Now I feel happy!
I want to see so many different
places in the night and day!
